explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a hybrid unsupervised and supervised machine learning algorithm for predicting loss given default (LGD).
explanations.supervised learning: The paper mentions the use of supervised learning as part of the hybrid algorithm for LGD prediction.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper mentions the use of unsupervised learning as part of the hybrid algorithm for LGD prediction.
explanations.classification: Predicting LGD can be framed as a classification problem where different levels of loss are categorized.
explanations.regression: Predicting LGD can also be framed as a regression problem where the exact amount of loss is predicted.
